item.description:
Mark Fisher of SpringSource will lead a discussion of Spring Integration at the JAVA meetup on July 21st.

Mark says:

"Spring Integration is a new addition to the Spring portfolio that provides an implementation of Enterprise Integration Patterns (as described in the book of the same name by Gregor Hohpe and Bobby Woolf). The Spring Integration API extends the Spring programming model with the same emphasis on simplicity and testability. After a very quick intro to Spring for those who are not familiar, we will explore Spring Integration through demos featuring the API, the XML namespace support, and the annotation-driven model."

Mark is a Senior Software Engineer at SpringSource, a Spring Framework committer, and lead of the Spring Integration project.
